name: Hanmi Financial Corporation
description: Hanmi Financial Corporation is a banking and financial services company that provides a variety of financial products and services primarily to the Asian-American community in the United States. Founded in 1982, Hanmi operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Hanmi Bank, which offers personal and commercial banking services, including checking and savings accounts, loans, and mortgages. The bank is recognized for its commitment to serving the needs of its customers, especially in the small business and real estate sectors. Hanmi Bank has a strong presence in California and other states with significant Asian-American populations, providing tailored financial solutions that cater to the unique needs of its diverse clientele. The bank's mission revolves around fostering financial growth and stability within the communities it serves, while also expanding its reach through innovation in banking services. Hanmi Financial Corporation emphasizes community involvement and has established various programs to support local businesses and educational initiatives. The company is also focused on digital banking solutions to enhance customer experience and streamline services. With a dedicated team and a customer-centric approach, Hanmi aims to be a trusted financial partner for individuals and businesses alike.
